title: Five-Bedroom Luxury Villa Escape with All-Inclusive Dining
description: Escape to the beach playground of Alibaug - located a three-hour drive from Mumbai - for a private villa stay for 10 people at Lohono Stays by Isprava. Enjoy the intimacy of a five-bedroom luxury villa, reserved just for you and your nearest and dearest. Relax with a bottle of wine on arrival and all-inclusive dining, including daily breakfast, lunch, afternoon tea and dinner for all guests.
offer_address: Satirje, Alibag, Maharashtra Village Jirad, Taluka Alibag, District Raigad 402201

title: High-End Radisson Alibaug Escape with Decadent Dining
description:
Escape the hustle and bustle of the city with a stay at the tranquil Radisson Blu Resort & Spa Alibaug. Just a 45-minute ferry ride from Mumbai, this upscale resort from the world-renowned Radisson brand is perfect for a relaxing weekend break. From luxurious accommodation to multiple dining outlets, an indulgent spa, sparkling swimming pool and lush gardens, this stylish hotel has everything covered. 

Enjoy daily buffet or set-menu breakfast, a three-course or buffet dinner for two once during the stay, a glass of beer or wine once during the stay (one drink per adult), 20% discount on food, drinks and spa treatments, and complimentary Wi-Fi.

**Travelling with family?** One child (aged five years and under) stays free on existing bedding with breakfast.
